UC San Diego

Computer Science & Engineering Society

Connecting UC San Diego's CSE community

Facebook Group Subscribe

Our Goal

At CSES, we aim to form a passionate community of computer scientists and engineers at UC San Diego. From tech talks, to social events, to outreach, we have a diverse set of events and activities that appeal to any computer scientist or engineer.

Events

First event

Monday, Feb 1

10am - 8pm

Peterson Hall 104

PROM

Monday, Feb 1 - Tuesday, Mar 1

Ends 11:59PM

Project of the Month (PROM) is a month long "hackathon" held by CSES. This month's prompt is Education. For more information, check out the links below.

Facebook Devpost PROM Page

CSE Day

Thursday, Feb 25

10am - 6pm

Center Hall 105

Join us for CSE Day! CSE Day is 8 hours long, filled with tech talks, coding sessions, and much more. Plus, free food will be provided. Make sure you come early to secure your spot!
